Services

Our platform is unique because it handles everything. You can do all type of in-land transportation from your lazr account.


Over the road

Our pricing engine is simply unique. You will get instant pricing from all major carriers, that is a feat in itself. Lazr pushes this perk further by offering the offer of thousands of partner-carriers and 3PL's in the mix.

how does it work?

shipping merchandise can be complex and long. There is a lot to know, after all people study years to become a logistician. A simple error can cost you and your company a lot because the cargo isn't where it should be, when it should be. Also, there are many other speed-bumps you will hit such as freight classes, customs documentation, insurance or even zip codes. Our platform makes this process easy, quick and fun. Avoid this mess that you used to spend hours on and handle your freight booking in seconds. Once this is taken care of, let our awesome command center provide the feeling of control you wish you had now. You will know where your merchandise is, be provided with useful data and improve further your logistics operations. Start shipping like a pro now and spend time on what matters, the reason your company exists, its very own operations.



the step-by-step illustration below explains how it works.




  • step 1

    You build your awesome product

    Your company knows how to create amazing things. Your stuff is produced or sourced like only you can. Meanwhile, our team has created a unique platform helping spread the good news that is your product to your customers, suppliers and other.

  • step 2

    Log-in to your lazr account

    You can log in to your account from anywhere, on your computer, phone or tablet.

  • step 3

    Get prices

    Go to the ''get prices'' tab, enter your shipment info. Bam, just like that you scanned the market and got the best deal. Now that all options are layed-out in front of you, you can easily select the best service-type to suit your needs.

  • step 4

    Select desired option & book!

    Should your shipment be critical, select the quickest transit-time. Should you require special-care, select one of our standard partners and they will handle with care. Your concern is cost-effectiveness, no problem et got that as well, the cheapest option is right up there! Finally, for all sopecialized needs, go with our unique custom quote option and logistics specialist from our partnered 3PL's will send you a custom route very soon.

  • step 5

    Documentation

    Preparing documentation in order to ship merchandise takes time and is boring. Nobody likes that. The good news is you will never need to fill out a bill of lading ever again with Lazr. You can download it from the order and you can upload any other documentation you need within the order for easy access.

  • step 6

    Truck on the way!

    Once a shipment is processed in Lazr, driver is on they way! You can access all your shipments information from your dashboard. You will also have all the information you may need to manage your over the road logistics from there!
